title: Academic Excellence
content: I’m Ahmed Emara, a fresh Computer Science graduate.
Throughout my academic career, I consistently secured the top position in my class for two consecutive semesters, demonstrating my insatiable curiosity and unwavering dedication to excellence.
My graduation project received funding from ITIDA.
Secured 3rd place in the 6th Olympiad for the Computer Science and Informatics Sector for the graduation project’s innovative impact on education.
I was honored with the 2023/2024 Computer Science Society Prize for the best capstone project.

title: Competitive Achievement
content: Represented my university at the ECPC in summer 2022.
Collaborated with exceptional peers to conquer intricate coding challenges, showcasing my resilience in real-world problem-solving scenarios.

title: Teaching and Mentorship
content: Beyond the classroom, I've embraced a role as a problem-solving instructor.
Guiding fellow students through coding challenges, deepening my understanding and igniting a passion for teaching and mentorship.

title: Internship Experience
content: My 2023 ITWorx internship transformed me, enhancing technical skills and creative problem-solving. A highlight was co-developing an AI-driven comic app that merges user prompts with AI images for captivating comic strips. This spanned AI APIs, image processing, and frontend work. Collaborating with experts, I grasped iterative tech refinement and learned adaptability.

Resulting from my ITWorx internship, the AI comic app epitomizes tech-creativity harmony. It interprets user prompts, AI-curates images, and creates dynamic comics. I contributed in AI integration, image processing, and frontend. This deepened my tech prowess and renewed my innovation dedication. Excited to further leverage tech for impactful strides in computer science.

title: Future Aspirations
content: My journey in the world of Computer Science is an ever-evolving adventure.
Eagerly leveraging my skills and experiences to push boundaries and create a meaningful impact.
Continuing to explore new horizons, collaborate on innovative projects, and strive for excellence in the ever-dynamic realm of technology.
